summary: This is an email chain from May 2021 discussing a perceived threat against Tova, a victim who is one of the Epstein guards, and her attorney's request for an FBI threat assessment. The chain involves coordination between the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), FBI agents, and the victim's attorneys regarding the threat and potential legal actions like a subpoena to Google.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Attorney from Foy & Seplowitz LLC who forwarded a threatening email to the US Attorney's Office, requesting an FBI threat assessment for his client Tova.

persons.name: James Seplowitz
persons.context: Partner of Jason Foy who initially received the threatening email at their law firm.

persons.name: Eric Sarraga
persons.context: Copied on the internal email between attorneys Jason Foy and James Seplowitz regarding the threat.

persons.name: Tova
persons.context: Identified as a victim and one of the Epstein guards; the subject of a perceived threat, with her plea to the DP scheduled for the next day.

connections.description: Law partners at Foy & Seplowitz LLC, collaborating on the threat assessment request for their client Tova.
Jason Foy is acting as Tova's attorney, requesting an FBI threat assessment on her behalf.
James Seplowitz is a law partner involved in the case, as the threatening email was sent to him.

events.title: Threatening email received
events.description: An email perceived as a threat against Tova's safety was sent from 'Vegas Army Vet' to attorney James Seplowitz.

events.title: Plea to the DP scheduled
events.description: Tova's plea to the DP (likely meaning 'Deferred Prosecution' or similar) was scheduled for this day, as mentioned in the email.

events.title: Request for FBI threat assessment
events.description: Attorney Jason Foy formally requested the US Attorney's Office to have the FBI conduct a threat assessment regarding the email threat against Tova.

keyFacts: Tova is identified as a victim and one of the Epstein guards, with a pending legal plea.
A threatening email was sent from a 'Vegas Army Vet' to attorney James Seplowitz, prompting a formal request for an FBI threat assessment.
The US Attorney's Office and FBI coordinated on the threat, discussing potential subpoenas to Google for subscriber information.
The email chain reveals ongoing security concerns for individuals associated with the Epstein case in 2021.
